response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit your needs. Considering its value and the benefits it provides, I propose a price of $14,000 for this exceptional item. This price reflects the quality and the high demand for the product, while still offering you a significant advantage over the market rate. I trust that this offer will meet your expectations and align with your budget. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information to make a decision.", "product_price": 14000}
